sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sign-up', templateUrl: './sign-up.component.html', styleUrls: ['./styles.css'] }) export class SignUpComponent { isSignUp: boolean = false; toggleForm() { this.isSignUp = !this.isSignUp; } } Sign In/Up Form

Weekly Coding Challenge #1: Sign in/up Form
